heroes.name: Amunra
heroes.description: Amun-Ra is mostly situational. He performs well in Delusions Den and PVP, as well as in Odysseus, but his performance in other areas is average.

skills.name: Aten's Radiance
skills.description: Amun-Ra releases solar energy and rises into air, gaining Super Armor. He fires a solar blade to strike the nearest enemy and nearby targets, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK. When cast, it does not drain Energy but consumes 200 Energy per sec.

upgrades.level2: Solar blades heal Amun-Ra for 100% of the DMG dealt.
upgrades.level3: Increases the DMG of solar blades to 140% ATK.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the attack interval of solar blades to 0.7s.

skills.name: Blinding Sun-Disk
skills.description: Amun-Ra creates a Solar Aura near himself for 6s, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per sec to enemies inside and reducing their ATK by 20%.

upgrades.level2: Enemies inside Solar Aura have their ATK reduced by 30%.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per instance to 125% ATK.
upgrades.level4: Extends the duration of Solar Aura to 8s.

skills.name: Glare of Ra
skills.description: Amun-Ra gains 100% Dodge Rate for 8s at combat start.

upgrades.level2: Re-enters this state each time he casts the Ultimate.
upgrades.level3: Dodging an attack restores 50 Energy to Amun-Ra for the duration. This can only trigger once per sec.
upgrades.level4: Additionally gains 50% Effect RES for the duration. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: The Dawn on Benben
skills.description: Increases all allies' M-RES and Armor by 50% for 15s at combat start. Amun-Ra gains Energy Regen boost, increasing his Energy Regen by 50%, until any ally falls.

upgrades.level2: When the Energy Regen boost expires, all allies instantly restore 200 Energy.
upgrades.level3: Increases his M-RES & Armor to 75%.
upgrades.level4: Increases his Energy Regen to 80%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Sun-Blinded
relic.description: Blinding Sun-Disk remains permanently when cast, and its range moderately expands during Aten's Radiance. Enemies within range of Blinding Sun-Disk for 4s are stunned for 1s.

upgrades.level2: Enemies within range of Blinding Sun-Disk for 4s are stunned for 1.5s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Enemies within range of Blinding Sun-Disk for 4s are stunned for 2s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: The enhanced Blinding Sun-Disk creates a black hole during Aten's Radiance, slowly pulling all enemies on the battlefield toward Amun-Ra. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Anubis
heroes.description: Anubis is average, and he performs well almost everywhere, but he is best in PVP and in the tower, and worst in Grim Surge.

skills.name: Featherfall Judgment
skills.description: Anubis drains the soul of the weakest enemy, stunning them for 2s and dealing DMG equal to 450% of ATK. If the target is defeated when the skill ends, Anubis restores 600 Energy.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 500% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases Anubis's ATK by 20% upon defeating a target. This boost lasts until the battle ends.
upgrades.level4: After defeating a target, Anubis restores 25% of his max HP.

skills.name: Underworld Soulfarer
skills.description: The first time an enemy's HP drops below 80% in a battle, Anubis fades into the void. He then appears behind that enemy, deals DMG equal to 240% of ATK, and stuns the target for 2s.

upgrades.level2: When dealing DMG, steals 150 Energy from the target.
upgrades.level3: Stun now lasts for 3s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 300% ATK.

skills.name: Mythic Embalmer
skills.description: Each time Anubis loses a total of 50% of his max HP, he becomes immune to DMG and untargetable for 3s. This effect can only trigger once every 10s.

upgrades.level2: Increases Anubis's ATK by 20% until the battle ends when triggered.
upgrades.level3: Increases Lifesteal by 20% until the battle ends when triggered.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK by 30% and grants 30% Lifesteal when triggered. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Shadowy Was-Scepter
skills.description: Spins his scepter to attack nearby enemies, dealing DMG equal to 210% of ATK and reducing their healing effects by 50% for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 235% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases healing reduction to 80%.
upgrades.level4: DMG dealt increases to 260% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Tomb Protector
relic.description: Increases DMG dealt by Featherfall Judgment by 30% to enemies with less than 50% HP.

upgrades.level2: Enemies cannot receive healing during Featherfall Judgment. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: If an enemy drops below 5% HP after taking DMG from Featherfall Judgment, it executes that enemy. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt by Featherfall Judgment by 50% to enemies with less than 50% HP. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Aquarius
heroes.description: Doxia, known as Aquarius is the goddess of wisdom, truth and knowledge. Her nearly human-sized vessel is both a source of insight and a wellspring of understanding.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Restores HP to allies over time.

upgrades.level2: Healing increased by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Adds shield on heal.
upgrades.level4: Removes one debuff.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

heroes.name: Ares
heroes.description: Ares, god of war, mutiny, slaughter and riot, is fierce beyond measure. Clad in feathered armor and leather bracers, he wields a terrifying circular saw, embodying unstoppable might.

skills.name: Battlefield Storm
skills.description: Ares swings his weapon, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per second to surrounding enemies for 6s. He is immune to Crowd Control for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per second to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK when the Ultimate ends.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per second to 120% of ATK.

skills.name: Flesh Grinder
skills.description: Ares deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to nearby enemies and reduces their Armor by 15% for 6s.

upgrades.level2: Reduces Armor by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Increases Armor reduction duration to 8s.
upgrades.level4: Reduces Armor by 25%.

skills.name: Unyielding Will
skills.description: The first time Ares takes lethal DMG, he becomes immune to the lethal DMG and gains immunity to all DMG and Crowd Control for 5s (can only trigger once per battle).

upgrades.level2: Permanently increases Lifesteal by 20% upon triggering.
upgrades.level3: Increases the immunity duration to 7s.
upgrades.level4: Permanently increases Lifesteal by 30% upon triggering.

skills.name: War God Spirit
skills.description: Ares's ATK increases as his HP drops, with a maximum boost of 90% ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK boost up to 105%.
upgrades.level3: Also gains up to 30% CRIT Rate.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK boost up to 120%.

relic.name: Celestial Dusk
relic.description: During Battlefield Storm, Ares takes 80% reduced DMG.

upgrades.level2: While Battlefield Storm is active, Ares gains a shield equal to 200% ATK upon defeating an enemy.
upgrades.level3: During Battlefield Storm, Ares is immune to all DMG. This does not affect the duration of other immunity skills.
upgrades.level4: While Battlefield Storm is active, Ares gains a shield equal to 240% ATK upon defeating an enemy.

heroes.name: Aries
heroes.description: Irena, known as Aries, rules over war and courage, granting mortals the will to fight and the spirit to press forward.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Restores HP to allies over time.

upgrades.level2: Healing increased by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Adds shield on heal.
upgrades.level4: Removes one debuff.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

relic.name: Hero’s Relic
relic.description: Casting Soothing Rain triggers an additional Spirit Therapy.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

heroes.name: Artemis
heroes.description: Artemis, mistress of beasts and sovereign of the wild, rules hunting, wildlife, the moon and the protection of maidens.

skills.name: Gale-Force Shot
skills.description: Artemis leaps to the very back of the battlefield and moves along the edge while firing 1 shot every 0.7s, dealing PEN DMG equal to 180% of ATK. The skill lasts 8s, and Artemis gains Super Armor for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per shot to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Extends the duration to 10s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per shot to 220% of ATK.

skills.name: Steadied Shot
skills.description: Fires a net at the nearest enemy, ensnaring them in place for 2s and dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Ensnared enemies have their Dodge Rate reduced by 50% for 8s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330% of ATK.

skills.name: Hunter’s Snare
skills.description: When a nearby target attacks Artemis, she gains an additional 50% Dodge Rate for 3s.

upgrades.level2: Gains an additional 70% Dodge Rate.
upgrades.level3: Increases the Dodge Rate duration to 5s.
upgrades.level4: Gains an additional 100% Dodge Rate.

skills.name: Cloud-Piercer
skills.description: Artemis fires piercing arrows at the most vulnerable enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to each enemy hit.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Piercing arrows also deal bonus DMG equal to 15% of the target’s current HP.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250% of ATK.

relic.name: Hail of Arrows
relic.description: Cloud-Piercer can be cast during Gale-Force Shot.

upgrades.level2: Reduces the cooldown of Cloud-Piercer by 50% during Gale-Force Shot.
upgrades.level3: Steadied Shot can be cast during Gale-Force Shot.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the cooldown of Steadied Shot by 50% during Gale-Force Shot.

heroes.name: Athena
heroes.description: Athena, goddess of wisdom and just war, embodies reason and strategy. She governs knowledge and handicraft, her power stretching from toolmaking to battlefield command.

skills.name: Aegis of Halo
skills.description: At combat start, Athena creates an aura near herself, reducing DMG taken by allies within by 10%. On the first cast, the aura grows to medium size, granting allies inside a shield equal to 200% of Athena's ATK while permanently enhancing the aura: she gains 5% DMG RED & ATK for each ally within the aura. On the second cast, all allies within the aura gain an additional 40% ATK SPD.

upgrades.level2: On the first cast, she gains 7.5% DMG RED & ATK for each ally within the aura.
upgrades.level3: Increases the shield strength to 240%.
upgrades.level4: On the second cast, all allies within the aura gain 60% ATK SPD.

skills.name: Divine Strike
skills.description: Swings the Aegis to deal DMG equal to 250% of ATK to the target and stun them for 1.5s.

upgrades.level2: She also gains a shield equal to 150% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 270%.
upgrades.level4: Shield Strength increases to 200% ATK.

skills.name: Blessing of Halo
skills.description: Athena blesses the ally with the highest ATK, increasing their ATK SPD by 25%.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK SPD to 35%.
upgrades.level3: Increases CRIT Rate by an additional 10%.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK SPD to 45%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Lay on Hands
skills.description: Showers the weakest ally and those nearby with sacred light, healing them for 200% ATK as HP and increasing their M-RES by 20% for 8s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 220% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases the duration of M-RES boost by 12s.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 240% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Haloed Ablution
relic.description: Upon casting Aegis of Halo 3 times in a battle, deals 5% max HP (up to 200% ATK) as True DMG per sec to enemies within range for 8s.

upgrades.level2: For each surviving ally (excluding minions) within the aura, Athena gains 25% Armor, 25% M-RES, and 10% Energy Regen. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Athena gains the enhanced first-cast effect of Aegis of Halo at combat start. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Athena gains 50% DMG RED when there are at least 3 allies within her aura. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Bastet
heroes.description: Bastet, the black cat guardian of homes, embodies elegance and mystery.

skills.name: Nile Dance
skills.description: Bastet gracefully leaps toward the position of the enemy with the highest ATK, dealing DMG equal to 160% of ATK to enemies around her each time she lands.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per hit to 180% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per instance to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Removes the cooldown of Feline Agility during the skill.

skills.name: Bastet’s Spin
skills.description: Bastet spins her body and strikes nearby enemies 3 times, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per strike and reducing their Hit Rate by 15% for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per hit to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Reduces the Hit Rate of hit enemies by 20%.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per hit to 120% of ATK.

skills.name: Furball
skills.description: Creates orbs that orbit Bastet for 15s, dealing DMG equal to 42% of ATK per second to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 50% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Duration extends to 30s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 60% of ATK.

skills.name: Feline Agility
skills.description: When Bastet takes a single hit dealing DMG exceeding 10% of her max HP, she becomes immune to the DMG and gains 30% Dodge Rate for 6s. Can trigger once every 15s.

upgrades.level2: Dodge bonus lasts for 8s.
upgrades.level3: Gains a 50% Dodge Rate.
upgrades.level4: Dodge bonus lasts for 10s.

relic.name: Feline Celerity
relic.description: Gains 25% Dodge Rate when HP drops below 50%.

upgrades.level2: When dodging a hit, deals 100% ATK as DMG to the attacker.
upgrades.level3: Gains 35% Dodge Rate when HP drops below 50%.
upgrades.level4: When dodging a hit, deals 200% ATK as DMG to the attacker.

heroes.name: Cancer
heroes.description: Thethys, known as Cancer is the godess of familial warmth and protection, guardian of the oceans.

skills.name: Cancer's Dance
skills.description: Heals surrounding allies 3 times, each restoring HP equal to 100% of Cancer's ATK + 70 and removing 1 debuff.

upgrades.level2: The unit receiving the final heal gains 15% increased ATK for 5s.
upgrades.level3: Restores HP equal to 120% ATK per heal.
upgrades.level4: The ATK buff now lasts 10s.

skills.name: Nourish
skills.description: Restores HP equal to 250% ATK to the weakest ally.

upgrades.level2: Healing increases to 270%.
upgrades.level3: Now heals 2 allies.
upgrades.level4: Healing increases to 300%.

skills.name: Crab Shell
skills.description: When an ally drops below 30% HP, they gain Super Armor for 6s and a shield equal to 300% of ATK. It can trigger only once per battle.

upgrades.level2: Immediately restores 100 Energy when triggered.
upgrades.level3: Shield Strength increases to 400% ATK.
upgrades.level4: Immediately restores 200 Energy when triggered. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Shelter
skills.description: Increases DMG RED of the nearest frontline ally by 15% during battle.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG RED to 20%.
upgrades.level3: Increases that unit's M-RES by an additional 50%.
upgrades.level4: Gains 30% Effect RES. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Vanguard Crab
relic.description: Additionally grants the nearest frontline ally Crab Shell once at combat start.

upgrades.level2: Crab Shell increases the target's Armor and M-RES by 25%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Additionally grants all frontline allies Crab Shell once at combat start. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Crab Shell increases the target's Armor and M-RES by 50%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Canopic Jar
heroes.description: Momus is the god of mockery, sencure, sarcasm, and reproach, as well as the guardian of writers and poets. He delights in exposing the flaws of gods and mortals, reveling in just critique.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Restores HP to allies over time.

upgrades.level2: Healing increased by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Adds shield on heal.
upgrades.level4: Removes one debuff.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

heroes.name: Capricorn
heroes.description: Oannios, goddess of Capricorn, embodies the rebellion and free will of both mortals and gods.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Restores HP to allies over time.

upgrades.level2: Healing increased by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Adds shield on heal.
upgrades.level4: Removes one debuff.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

heroes.name: Cashien
heroes.description: Caishen, guardian of wealth, rules over the flow of riches, success, and opportunity. Able to grant fortune or strip possessions, Caishen rewards diligence and punishes greed.

skills.name: Golden Rejuvenation
skills.description: Deals DMG equal to 270% of ATK to a target and restores 200 Energy to himself.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK bonus to 300%.
upgrades.level3: Restores 300 Energy to himself.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK bonus to 330%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Rollin' in Riches
skills.description: Caishen restores 100 Energy to allies in a large area around him and then restores 25 Energy per sec to them for the next 10s.

upgrades.level2: Increases Energy Regen to 30.
upgrades.level3: Also increases ATK of allies within range by 15% for 5s.
upgrades.level4: Increases Energy Regen to 35.

skills.name: Lucky Star Alight
skills.description: Before falling, becomes immune to the DMG and invincible for 2s. It can only trigger once.

upgrades.level2: Additionally restores HP equal to 200% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Additionally restores HP equal to 300% ATK.
upgrades.level4: The effect now trigger twice. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Endless Fortune
skills.description: Caishen is surrounded by 2 Golden Ingots upon entering battle. When a nearby ally's HP drops below 50%, an Ingot is consumed to restore 25% max HP to that ally. Using a Golden Ingot has an 8s CD for each Deity. Caishen can have a maximum of 3 Golden Ingots. Once all Golden Ingots are used, they are automatically replenished to full. This effect has a 20s CD.

upgrades.level2: Increases healing effect to 27%.
upgrades.level3: Golden Ingots +1 at combat start.
upgrades.level4: Increases healing effect to 30%.

relic.name: Fortune Leverage
relic.description: The first time an ally reaches 700 Energy, grants them 300 Energy.

upgrades.level2: The first time an ally reaches 650 Energy, grants them 350 Energy.
upgrades.level3: This effect can trigger repeatedly with a 15s CD. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: The first time an ally reaches 600 Energy, grants them 400 Energy. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Demeter
heroes.description: Demeter, earth goddess of agriculture, grain, harvest, and materia love, is often depicted as kind and gentle.

skills.name: The Earth’s Vigor
skills.description: Demeter roots herself, restraining enemies around her for 3s, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK every second. Each enemy restores HP equal to 90% of ATK to her per second. Demeter gains Super Armor for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per second to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Each enemy restores HP equal to 100% of her ATK per second.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per second to 120% of ATK.

skills.name: Sprawling Thorns
skills.description: Demeter controls vines to restrain the farthest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK and draining 100 Energy from them.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Energy drained increases to 150.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330% of ATK.

skills.name: Return of the Maiden
skills.description: Restores 2% HP every 0.2s for 3s when Demeter’s HP drops below 50%. Can be triggered once per battle.

upgrades.level2: Restores 3% HP every 0.2s.
upgrades.level3: Duration extends to 4s.
upgrades.level4: Can trigger twice per battle and once every 6s.

skills.name: Harvest’s Blessing
skills.description: Demeter grants a shield equal to 200% of ATK to herself and the most vulnerable ally. The shield lasts up to 10s.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increases to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases M-RES by 50% while the shield is active.
upgrades.level4: Shield strength increases to 250% of ATK.

relic.name: Four Seasons’ Bounty
relic.description: Demeter enters battle with 3 stacks of Abundance. Each stack reduces DMG taken by 15%. For every 30% of max HP lost, one stack is consumed. Stacks are regained when her HP is restored to a certain level.

upgrades.level2: When Demeter has 3 stacks of Abundance, she is immune to Crowd Control.
upgrades.level3: Each stack of Abundance reduces DMG taken by 17.5%.
upgrades.level4: Each stack of Abundance reduces DMG taken by 20%.

heroes.name: Diana
heroes.description: Diana, goddess of the moon and the oak, watches over the sacred moon, forests, hunting, and childbirth.

skills.name: Lunar Illumination
skills.description: Launches a Moonlight Shockwave in a straight line, dealing DMG equal to 260% of ATK to enemies along the path.

upgrades.level2: Reduces the Armor of hit enemies by 20% for 5s.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 285% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the Armor of hit enemies by 20% for 10s.

skills.name: Waxing Blessing
skills.description: Increases ATK SPD by 40% and Move SPD by 20% for all allies for 7s, and grants 15 Energy per second for the duration. Casts immediately at combat start.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK SPD to 50%.
upgrades.level3: Increases Energy gained per second to 20.
upgrades.level4: Extends the duration to 10s.

skills.name: Crescent’s Mark
skills.description: Permanently marks the enemy with the highest Armor, reducing their Armor by 20%.

upgrades.level2: Can now mark 2 enemies.
upgrades.level3: Marked enemies also have their CRIT RES reduced by 10%.
upgrades.level4: Marked enemies now have their Armor reduced by 25%.

skills.name: Moonlit Ambush
skills.description: Diana launches 3 quick attacks. The first 2 attacks deal DMG equal to 50% of ATK, and the 3rd attack deals DMG equal to 150% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases the last hit’s DMG to 170% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: The final hit is guaranteed to be a CRIT Hit.
upgrades.level4: Increases the last hit’s DMG to 200% of ATK.

relic.name: Selene’s Boon
relic.description: Blesses the ally with the highest ATK with moonlight. When the ally deals DMG, they deal extra DMG equal to 100% of Diana’s ATK to the target. Triggers once per second.

upgrades.level2: The first time Waxing Blessing is cast in battle, ATK SPD and Move SPD bonuses are doubled.
upgrades.level3: When either Diana or the moonlight-blessed ally casts an Ultimate, the other restores 100 Energy.
upgrades.level4: Extra DMG dealt is increased to 150% of Diana’s ATK.

heroes.name: Dionysus
heroes.description: Dionysus, goddes of wine and revels, embodies life's passion and unbridled joy. Handsome and radiant, she wears a cloak woven from grapevines, holding a wine cup and her Thyrsus.

skills.name: Toast of the Gods
skills.description: Grants all allies the [Frenzy] state for 5s: ATK SPD +50%, Energy Regen +30%, Skill CD -30%, Move SPD +50%, ATK +20%.

upgrades.level2: While in the [Frenzy] state, increases ATK SPD to 60% and Energy Regen to 35%.
upgrades.level3: Duration extends to 7s.
upgrades.level4: Using this skill also removes all debuffs from an ally and makes them immune to Crowd Control for 2s.

skills.name: Vintage Vivace
skills.description: Dionysus no longer performs Normal Attacks. Instead, she wanders the battlefield and raises a toast every 2.5s, restoring HP equal to 120% of ATK to the most vulnerable ally.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 160% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: The healed unit also gains 30% DMG RED.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Bacchic Blessing
skills.description: Dionysus raises a toast, increasing all allies' P&M-RES by 15% for 15s for each unique ally class on the battlefield.

upgrades.level2: Increases all allies' P&M-RES by 20%.
upgrades.level3: For each unique ally class on the battlefield, grants all allies a shield equal to 50% of her ATK.
upgrades.level4: Duration extends to 20s.

skills.name: Drunken Phantasm
skills.description: When Dionysus takes DMG from a nearby enemy, she reduces the DMG taken by 50% and blinks behind the safest ally. This can only trigger once every 8s.

upgrades.level2: Reduces 70% of the next DMG taken.
upgrades.level3: This effect can only trigger once every 6s.
upgrades.level4: Becomes immune to the next DMG taken.

relic.name: Revelry Queen
relic.description: When casting Bacchic Blessing, Dionysus buffs her allies based on their classes. This effect lasts until the battle ends and can stack up to 3 times.

upgrades.level2: Tank/Warrior: DMG RED +20%. Mage/Archer: DMG bonus +20%. Support/Assassin: Energy Regen +25%.
upgrades.level3: Reduces Bacchic Blessing's cooldown to 20s.
upgrades.level4: Casts Bacchic Blessing upon entering battle and restores 200 Energy to each affected Deity if at least 3 classes are affected.

heroes.name: Fengyi
heroes.description: Fengyi, goddess of winds, rules ober their flow, speed, and direction, especially the gentle and lively ones.

skills.name: Great Rising Gale
skills.description: Fengyi channels all whirlwinds, dealing DMG equal to 280% of ATK to targets in a large area and consuming all her whirlwinds. Each whirlwind deals 15% of ATK as extra DMG.

upgrades.level2: Each whirlwind deals 30% of ATK as extra DMG.
upgrades.level3: ATK bonus increases to 320%.
upgrades.level4: Restores 30 Energy for each whirlwind she has when casting a skill.

skills.name: Billowing Sleeves
skills.description: Fengyi swings her sleeves, firing a tornado at the nearest target and dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to all enemies in a straight line.

upgrades.level2: ATK bonus increases to 220%.
upgrades.level3: Reduces the M-RES of hit units by 20%.
upgrades.level4: ATK bonus increases to 250%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Slumbering Breeze
skills.description: Fengyi gains 2 whirlwinds upon entering battle. Each whirlwind grants Fengyi 15% ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases every whirlwind's ATK bonus to 20%.
upgrades.level3: Fengyi gains 3 whirlwinds upon entering battle.
upgrades.level4: Increases every whirlwind's ATK bonus to 25%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Drifting Petals
skills.description: The first time an enemy Deity's HP drops below 80%, Fengyi deals DMG equal to 150% of ATK to that Deity and gains a whirlwind. Fengyi can have a maximum of 4 whirlwinds at once.

upgrades.level2: ATK bonus increases to 165%.
upgrades.level3: Maximum whirlwinds +2.
upgrades.level4: ATK bonus increases to 180%.

relic.name: Vortex of Grace
relic.description: Releases Great Rising Gale to create 1 whirlwind.

upgrades.level2: Releases Great Rising Gale to create 2 whirlwinds.
upgrades.level3: Restores 50 Energy when Fengyi gains a whirlwind. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Releases Great Rising Gale to create 3 whirlwinds. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Freya
heroes.description: Freya's use is mostly situational. She performs well in Delusions Den and Torrent Rift, as well as in Odysseus, but her performance in other areas is average.

skills.name: Splendor of Love
skills.description: Freya harnesses the power of nature, channeling for 8s and restoring HP equal to 100% of ATK to all allies each second.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 110% of ATK per second.
upgrades.level3: Freya gains Super Armor during her Ultimate.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 120% of ATK per second.

skills.name: Flower Whispers
skills.description: Restores HP equal to 100% of ATK to the most vulnerable ally, then restores HP equal to 100% of ATK per second for 3s.

upgrades.level2: Restores an additional 75 Energy to the target.
upgrades.level3: Increases initial and over-time Energy restoration to 120%.
upgrades.level4: Increases Energy restoration to 150.

skills.name: Petal Palette
skills.description: Increases all healing effects from Freya by 15%.

upgrades.level2: Increases healing effect by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Increases healing effect on allies with less than 50% HP by 20%.
upgrades.level4: Increases healing effect by 30%.

skills.name: Lethal Petal
skills.description: Stuns an enemy for 3s, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per second.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per second to 120% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Stun duration increases to 4s.
upgrades.level4: Stunned enemies take 20% increased DMG.

relic.name: Ward of Splendor
relic.description: All allies take 20% reduced DMG during Splendor of Love.

upgrades.level2: Gains 300 Energy upon entering battle.
upgrades.level3: Reduces DMG taken by 30%.
upgrades.level4: Reduces DMG taken by 40%.

heroes.name: Geb
heroes.description: Geb is the guardian of earth and nature. His rocky form is draped in lush vegetation, a microcosm of the natural world.

skills.name: Unstoppable
skills.description: Geb enters the [Boulder] state, gaining a shield equal to 30% of his max HP. He then rolls forward, continuously knocking back enemies in front and dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per hit to 115% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases shield strength to 40% of max HP.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per hit to 130% of ATK.

skills.name: Stone Armor
skills.description: Geb grants himself a shield equal to 15% of max HP, lasting up to 6s.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increases to 20% of max HP.
upgrades.level3: Takes 10% less DMG while shielded.
upgrades.level4: Shield strength increases to 25% of max HP.

skills.name: Heart of the Earth
skills.description: Geb has rocky skin. The closer an enemy is to Geb, the less DMG they deal to him, with a maximum reduction of 30%.

upgrades.level2: Reduces up to 37.5% DMG.
upgrades.level3: Reduces up to 45% DMG.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the ATK SPD of nearby enemies by 25%.

skills.name: Nature’s Wrath
skills.description: Geb strikes nearby enemies 3 times, each hit dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK. The last hit knocks down enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Reduces the Hit Rate of hit enemies by 30% for 5s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 120% of ATK.

relic.name: Earthshaker
relic.description: When shielded, Geb deals DMG equal to 5% of his max HP to the attacker each time he takes DMG.

upgrades.level2: Geb gains a shield equal to 30% of max HP at combat start.
upgrades.level3: Gains 300 Energy when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Geb gains a shield equal to 50% of max HP at combat start.

heroes.name: Gemini
heroes.description: Gemini, known as the twin deities Pollux and Castor of divinity and shadow, watches over family and brotherhood.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Restores HP to allies over time.

upgrades.level2: Healing increased by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Adds shield on heal.
upgrades.level4: Removes one debuff.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increased.
upgrades.level3: Cooldown reduced.
upgrades.level4: Triggers automatically once per battle.

heroes.name: Hecate
heroes.description: Hecate, the tripled-formed goddess of the dark moon, opportunity, and irresistible death, embodies the shadow side of the world.

skills.name: Fall to Shadow!
skills.description: Gains 200 Energy upon entering battle.

upgrades.level2: She steals 2% max HP and 2% ATK from all enemies when casting her Ultimate, up to 100% of her ATK and HP. She grows in size with each steal. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Plunders 3% of the max HP and ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Plunders 4% of the max HP and ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: The World's Dark Half
skills.description: Hecate summons nether flames to attack all enemies, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK every 2s for 10s. She restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG dealt when the skill ends. If the Ultimate is cast again before the previous one ends, it immediately restores HP based on the DMG dealt so far and resets the DMG timer.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per sec to 120% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG immediately upon dealing DMG.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per sec to 150% ATK.

skills.name: Soul Drain
skills.description: Hecate continuously deals DMG equal to 50% of ATK to the nearest enemy every 0.5s and gains 50% Lifesteal for 2.5s.

upgrades.level2: Increases Lifesteal to 100%.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 75% ATK every 0.5s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 90% ATK every 0.5s.

skills.name: Trivia's Edge
skills.description: Hecate deals DMG equal to 220% of ATK to one enemy and stuns them for 2s, prioritizing the opposite target.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 240% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 260% ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 280% ATK and stun duration to 3s. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

passive.name: Irresistible Force
passive.description: The ATK she receives grows as her current HP increases. It reaches the maximum bonus ATK of 30% at 80% HP.

upgrades.level2: Upon casting the Ultimate, she gains the max bonus ATK regardless of her HP.
upgrades.level3: Increases CRIT Rate by an additional 15%.
upgrades.level4: Increases the bonus ATK to 50%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Fall to Shadow!
relic.description: Enhances Fall to Shadow!, enabling HP and ATK plunder when casting the Ultimate.

upgrades.level2: Unlocks HP & ATK steal at 2%. (Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Increases plunder to 3%. (Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Increases plunder to 4%. (Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Hela
heroes.description: Hela, goddess of death and queen of the netherworld, rules the souls of the dead and the order of the realm below.

skills.name: Decay of All
skills.description: Hela shoots Nether Fireballs at the 3 nearest enemies on the field, each dealing DMG equal to 250% of ATK. The fireballs explode to deal DMG equal to 150% of ATK to surrounding enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases the DMG of each Nether Fireball to 280% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases the explosion DMG of each Nether Fireball to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Hela shoots an extra Nether Fireball.

skills.name: Blight upon Life
skills.description: Hela steals Energy from a random enemy, draining 30 Energy every 0.5s for 2s.

upgrades.level2: Steals HP equal to 50% of ATK from the target every 0.5s.
upgrades.level3: Reduces DMG taken by 50% during the skill.
upgrades.level4: Steals 50 Energy from the target every 0.5s.

skills.name: Devour the Dead
skills.description: A unit falls on the battlefield restores 100 Energy to Hela. This effect has a 0.5s CD.

upgrades.level2: Absorbs 10% of the fallen unit's ATK.
upgrades.level3: Energy Regen increases to 150.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK absorbed to 20%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Prey on the Weak
skills.description: Hela deals 240% ATK as DMG to the weakest enemy. Defeating the target grants another cast.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 260% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Gains 10% bonus DMG per cast (stacking).
upgrades.level4: Gains 20% bonus DMG per cast (stacking). (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Defile the Sacred
relic.description: When Soul Devourer triggers, it detonates the fallen's soul, dealing DMG equal to 160% of ATK to targets within range. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG bonus to 200%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Upon exploding, the souls restore Energy to Hela equal to the Energy restored by Soul Devourer. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG bonus to 240%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Hladgunnr
heroes.description: Hladgunnr, the elegant and dignified Valkyrie of the Swan, always appears to mortals in a robe of white feathers. Her kiss can bring eternal rest or rouse the final courage of the dying.

skills.name: Luminous Feather Lunge
skills.description: Hladgunnr dashes backward, then charges forward, dealing DMG equal to 270% of her ATK to the target and knocking them back.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300%.
upgrades.level3: Also grants herself a shield equal to 300% of her ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Sacred Meditation
skills.description: Hladgunnr enters the [Slumber] state upon entering battle. She is disabled but restores HP equal to 100% of ATK per sec for 10s. Casting her Ultimate cancels the [Slumber] state, grants her a shield equal to 500% of ATK, and makes her immune to Crowd Control for the skill's duration. After that, her Normal Attacks deal DMG equal to 200% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Gains 40% DMG RED while in the [Slumber] state.
upgrades.level3: This effect triggers one extra time when Hladgunnr is about to fall.
upgrades.level4: Gains 60% DMG RED while in the [Slumber] state.

skills.name: Luminous Aegis
skills.description: Hladgunnr's every Ultimate grants 20% ATK. Max at 4 stacks.

upgrades.level2: Hladgunnr gains 20% DMG RED for the first release.
upgrades.level3: Gains 25% DMG RED for the first release.
upgrades.level4: Gains 30% DMG RED for the first release.

skills.name: Domain of Verdict
skills.description: Hladgunnr creates a halo around herself, dealing DMG equal to 400% of her ATK to nearby enemies and increasing her Lifesteal by 50% and ATK DPS by 100% for 10s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 440%.
upgrades.level3: When her Ultimate cancels Sacred Meditation, she inherits the remaining buffs from it.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 480%.

relic.name: Luminous Verdict
relic.description: Luminous Aegis gains an additional upgrade effect: After Hladgunnr casts her Ultimate 3 times, 10% of the DMG dealt by Hladgunnr is converted to True DMG.

upgrades.level2: Reduces the number of casts required to upgrade Luminous Aegis by one.
upgrades.level3: 30% of the DMG dealt by Hladgunnr is converted to True DMG.
upgrades.level4: Hladgunnr gains Super Armor for 6s after each cast of her Ultimate. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Horus
heroes.description: Horus, god of sky and vengeance, is the eagle that rules above. His left eye mirrors the moon, his right echoes the sun, and his wings stretch wide enough to shadow the world.

skills.name: Eye for an Eye
skills.description: When attacked in the [Revenge] state, Horus has a 30% chance to cast Frenzied Blade. This effect triggers once every 12s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 25% of the DMG dealt by Frenzied Blade. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: When attacked in the [Revenge] state, Horus has a 30% chance to cast Frenzied Blade. This effect triggers once every 8s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: When attacked in the [Revenge] state, Horus has a 30% chance to cast Frenzied Blade. This effect triggers once every 4s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Vengeful Bloodbath
skills.description: Horus marks the enemy with the highest ATK, dealing DMG equal to 300% of ATK to them. He then enters the [Revenge] state for 10s, focusing on that target, transforming his attacks into powerful strikes, increasing CRIT Rate by 100%, and taking 20% reduced DMG for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK by 20% while in the [Revenge] state.
upgrades.level3: Reduces DMG taken during the [Revenge] state by 30%.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK by 40% while in the [Revenge] state.

skills.name: Frenzied Blade
skills.description: Horus deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to the nearest enemy and those around it. In the [Revenge] state, he deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to surrounding enemies and reduces their Armor by 20% for 8s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220%.
upgrades.level3: Reduces Armor by 30% when he is in the [Revenge] state.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250%.

skills.name: Raptor’s Rage
skills.description: Horus increases ATK SPD by 15% during battle and an additional 40% when he is in the [Revenge] state.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK SPD to 20% and CRIT DMG by 20%.
upgrades.level3: ATK SPD is increased by 55% when he is in the [Revenge] state.
upgrades.level4: ATK SPD is increased to 25% and CRIT DMG is increased to 40%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Retributive Wait
relic.description: When Horus's HP drops below 50%, he retreats from the battlefield for 5s, restoring 50 Energy per sec. He returns to his starting position when he comes back. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 50% of ATK per sec while retreating.
upgrades.level3: Restores 60 Energy per sec while retreating.
upgrades.level4: It can trigger twice per battle and once every 6s. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

heroes.name: Iris
heroes.description: Isis is the godess of life, magic, marriage, and fertility. Her name means throne,  marking her as a symbol of royal authority, the greates mother, and a devoted wife.

skills.name: Omniscient Arrow
skills.description: After every 2 Normal Attacks, Isis's next attack becomes an Omniscient Arrow, which deals DMG equal to 160% of ATK plus bonus DMG equal to 10% of the target's max HP (up to 300% of her ATK).

upgrades.level2: Omniscient Arrow is guaranteed to trigger when the battle starts.
upgrades.level3: The bonus DMG is increased to 12% of the target's max HP (up to 400% of her ATK).
upgrades.level4: The arrow will deal DMG equal to 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Omnipotence
skills.description: Isis channels her power and briefly enters the [Omniscient] state. Her ATK SPD is increased by 100% and her attack range becomes infinite, but she loses 45 Energy every 0.2s when she is in the state.

upgrades.level2: Every Normal Attack becomes an Omniscient Arrow for the duration of the skill.
upgrades.level3: Increases ATK SPD to 150%.
upgrades.level4: Reduces Energy lost to 40.

skills.name: The Cunning Goddess
skills.description: When no enemies are within 3 meters of Isis, her ATK is increased by 30%. She loses this bonus when an enemy is within 3 meters of her.

upgrades.level2: Increases Isis's Armor PEN by 10% while ATK bonus lasts.
upgrades.level3: Increases ATK bonus to 36%.
upgrades.level4: Increases Isis's Armor PEN by 20% while the ATK bonus lasts.

skills.name: True Name Invocation
skills.description: For every 5 Ultimates cast by allies, Isis gains 20% increased ATK SPD, stacking up to 4 times.

upgrades.level2: Increases each stack of ATK SPD bonus to 25%.
upgrades.level3: Gains 1 extra stack of ATK SPD buff when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Increases each stack of ATK SPD bonus to 30%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Pristine Mantra
relic.description: Reduces the trigger count required for True Name Invocation to 3. Its stacks grant Isis additional effects: Each stack increases Isis's Hit Rate by 20%.

upgrades.level2: Increases CRIT Rate by 30% at 3 stacks.
upgrades.level3: Stacks up to 6 times.
upgrades.level4: Each stack increases Hit Rate by 30%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Jingwei
heroes.description: Jingwei, the indomitable bird born from a drowned soul, embodies resolve and perseverance. Her life is devoted to filling the sea.

skills.name: Howling Hurricane
skills.description: Jingwei enters Hurricane form, firing a whirlwind at the farthest enemy every 1.5s, dealing DMG equal to 150% of ATK. Energy is not immediately drained on activation; each whirlwind costs 260 Energy.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt by each whirlwind to 175% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt by each whirlwind to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with less than 50% HP by 20%.

skills.name: Withering Wings
skills.description: Jingwei leaps and strikes the farthest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and causing that enemy to take 20% increased DMG from her for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG taken by hit enemies by 30%.

skills.name: Grand Nosedive
skills.description: For every 3 Ultimates cast by other allies, Jingwei’s ATK is increased by 10%, stacking up to 3 times.

upgrades.level3: Howling Hurricane creates an extra whirlwind with a 65% DMG bonus.
upgrades.level4: Howling Hurricane creates an extra whirlwind with an 80% DMG bonus.

heroes.name: Jormungandr
heroes.description: Jormungandr, the Midgart Serpent, encircling the world and upholding the earth, rules ober seas and storms, shrouded in mystery with a wide-brimmed hat concealing the face.

skills.name: Venom Spray
skills.description: Upon entering battle, summons a poison mist around Jormungandr, dealing damage equal to 70% of ATK every second to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Leaves a poison pool when falling. The poison pool lasts 10s and deals damage every second equal to twice the poison mist damage. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Damage per second increased to 85% of ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Damage per second increased to 100% of ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.description: Jormungandr leaps into the air and rains down a swarm of snakes 5 times, each hit dealing damage equal to 100% of ATK.

heroes.name: Medusa
heroes.description: Medusa is the Gorgon who has venemous snakes for hair. She embodies confidence, independence, resilience, fearless courage, unwaivering faith and the power of rebirth, yet also venom and irreversible fate.

skills.name: Petrifying Gaze
skills.description: Medusa fires a petrifying beam, dealing DMG equal to 320% of ATK to enemies in a rectangle and petrifying them for 3s. Petrified units have their healing effects reduced by 80%.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 340% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: If the target has Serpent Kiss, it deals an additional 10% DMG.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 360% of ATK.

skills.name: Arcane Serpent
skills.description: Medusa shoots a small snake at the nearest enemy without Serpent Kiss, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and inflicting Serpent Kiss. It then bounces to all other enemies with Serpent Kiss (Serpent Kiss reduces the target’s M-RES by 30% for 12s).

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per bounce by 5%.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Snake Hair
skills.description: After every 2 attacks, Medusa casts Arcane Serpent.

upgrades.level2: Each Serpent Kiss on the field increases Medusa’s ATK SPD by 10%.
upgrades.level3: She marks the enemy in the opposite position when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Each Serpent Kiss on the field increases Medusa’s ATK SPD by 20%.

skills.name: Serpent Kiss
skills.description: Medusa attacks the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and inflicting Serpent Kiss, reducing the target’s M-RES by 30% for 12s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 250% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 280% of ATK.

relic.name: To the Marrow
relic.description: When Medusa deals DMG to an enemy with Serpent Kiss, she triggers an explosion centered on the target, dealing DMG equal to 80% of her ATK in a small area. This effect has a 5s cooldown for each unit.

upgrades.level2: Deals 100% ATK as AoE DMG.
upgrades.level3: When an enemy with Serpent Kiss falls, a small snake flies to the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 150% of ATK and inflicting Serpent Kiss.
upgrades.level4: Deals 120% ATK as AoE DMG.

heroes.name: Momus
heroes.description: Momus is the god of mockery, sencure, sarcasm, and reproach, as well as the guardian of writers and poets. He delights in exposing the flaws of gods and mortals, reveling in just critique.

skills.name: Deceptive Magic
skills.description: After using a skill, Momus grants himself a shield equal to 50% of ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: When gaining a shield, grants a shield with equal strength to the nearest ally. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Shield strength increases to 75% ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Shield strength increases to 100% ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Come at Me!
skills.description: Momus leaps into the center of the most enemy-clustered area, taunting nearby enemies for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Gains 25% DMG RED during the Ultimate.
upgrades.level3: Gains Super Armor during the Ultimate.
upgrades.level4: Gains 50% DMG RED during the Ultimate.

skills.name: Sweet Pain
skills.description: Whenever taking 20% max HP as DMG, Momus launches a counterattack in a small area, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK. This effect can trigger multiple times.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 230%.
upgrades.level3: For each enemy unit hit, restores HP equal to 50% of ATK (up to 250% of ATK).
upgrades.level4: Reduces the DMG taken required to trigger the effect to 15% of max HP.

skills.name: Bomb Party
skills.description: Momus detonates a bouncing bomb, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and knocking down nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 230%.
upgrades.level3: Hit units also have their CRIT Rate reduced by 25% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 260%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Phantom Puppet
relic.description: When Momus's HP drops below 50% for the first time, he becomes invisible and summons an Echo of himself (Passive). The Echo inherits 50% of his ATK and lasts 10s. Momus returns when the Echo falls.

upgrades.level2: If it's triggered during the Ultimate, he stealthes and summons an Echo to continue the Ultimate's taunt.
upgrades.level3: The Echo also inherits Momus's Sweet Pain.
upgrades.level4: Gains 1 more use, with a 10s CD between two uses. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

heroes.name: Nemesis
heroes.description: Nemesis, goddess of vengeance and justice, rules over the balance of cause and effect, punishing arrogance and injustice.

skills.name: Air Rend
skills.description: Dashes towards the farthest enemy and deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to enemies along the path. Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK when the skill ends.

upgrades.level2: ATK bonus increases to 220%.
upgrades.level3: Defeating an enemy resets the skill's CD.
upgrades.level4: Increases the shield bonus to 250%.

skills.name: Blade Waltz
skills.description: Targets the farthest enemy and dashes 4 times. Each dash prioritizes new targets, dealing DMG equal to 160% of ATK to enemies along the path. She is untargetable during the skill.

upgrades.level2: Hit enemies have their M-RER reduced by 10% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.
upgrades.level3: ATK bonus increases to 170%.
upgrades.level4: ATK bonus increases to 180%.

upgrades.level2: Increases Dodge Rate by 50% for the duration.

upgrades.level4: ATK bonus increases to 100%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

heroes.name: Nuwa
heroes.description: Nuwa is the goddess of creation who breathed life into clay, shaping it into humans with warmth and soul. SHe is also the one who gathered the five-colored stones to mend heaven and earth when they shattered.

skills.name: Law of Creation
skills.description: At combat start, summons a Bulwark Figurine that charges the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK and stunning them for 2s. The Bulwark Figurine inherits 200% of her max HP and 100% of her ATK. Activating the skill deploys a barrier equal to 1600% of ATK for 6s that absorbs damage for allies behind it. If a Bulwark Figurine already exists, its HP is fully restored and the barrier is redeployed.

upgrades.level2: The shield absorbs DMG equal to 2200% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: The shield absorbs DMG equal to 3000% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: While the barrier is active, the Bulwark Figurine takes 20% reduced DMG.

skills.name: Divine Embrace
skills.description: Grants a shield equal to 240% of ATK to a frontline ally and all allies within 3 meters. While the shield is active, it blocks one incoming Crowd Control effect.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increases to 270% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Nuwa gains a shield when casting the skill.
upgrades.level4: Takes 50% less DMG while shielded.

skills.name: Children of the Clay
skills.description: Summons a Greataxe Figurine inheriting 150% of her max HP and 120% of her ATK. It attacks the farthest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 300% of ATK and stunning them for 1s. If a Greataxe Figurine already exists, it is fully healed and leaps into enemy clusters, dealing 300% ATK DMG and knocking enemies down.

upgrades.level2: Increases Greataxe Figurine stun duration to 1.5s.
upgrades.level3: Leaps high and lands, taunting enemies within range for 5s and gaining 100% Armor for the duration.
upgrades.level4: Increases smash DMG and clustered area DMG to 330% of ATK.

skills.name: Sky Salvation
skills.description: Summons a Support Figurine inheriting 100% of her max HP and 150% of her ATK. It heals the most vulnerable ally for 100% ATK every 2.5s. If a Support Figurine already exists, it is fully healed and instead heals the most vulnerable ally for 300% ATK.

upgrades.level2: Grants buffs based on ally position: frontline allies gain 10% Dodge Rate, backline allies gain 10% DMG bonus for 10s.
upgrades.level3: Support Figurine now heals for 110% ATK with each Normal Attack.
upgrades.level4: When a Bulwark Figurine is on the battlefield, she heals it every 2.5s.

relic.name: Primordial Spirit
relic.description: Casting her Ultimate instantly triggers Children of the Clay and Sky Salvation once.

upgrades.level2: Nuwa gains an additional 30% DMG Reduction for each Figurine on the battlefield.
upgrades.level3: Nuwa gains 100 Energy for each Figurine defeated.
upgrades.level4: Whenever an ally summons a minion, Nuwa blesses it with Divine Embrace, granting it a shield.

heroes.name: Nyx
heroes.description: Nyx. ancient goddess of night, reigns over darkness and dreams. Her star-woven gown drifts as she walks, leaving silence beyond measure and dreams without end.

skills.name: Evernight Raid
skills.description: Nyx blinks behind the symmetrically opposite enemy at combat start, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK. She also prevents the target from recovering Energy for 8s and stuns them for 3s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220%.
upgrades.level3: Stuns last for 4s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250%.

skills.name: Nocturnal Judgment
skills.description: Performs a 4-hit combo on the nearest enemy, each hit dealing DMG equal to 180% of ATK. Nyx is untargetable and continuously controls the enemy during this. The final hit stuns the target for 2s.

upgrades.level2: The last hit deals bonus DMG equal to 10% of the target's lost HP (up to 200% of Nyx's ATK).
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per hit to 200% ATK.
upgrades.level4: The last hit deals bonus DMG equal to 15% of the target's lost HP (up to 300% of Nyx's ATK). (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Encroaching Nightfall
skills.description: Nyx creates a Dark Domain in an enemy-clustered area and becomes untargetable for the duration. She strikes enemies in Dark Domain 3 times, each dealing DMG equal to 150% of ATK. She emerges in the end and deals DMG equal to 250% of ATK to all enemies in Dark Domain.

upgrades.level2: Strikes enemies in Dark Domain 3 times, each dealing DMG equal to 180% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases the final hit's DMG to 280%.
upgrades.level4: The final hit is guaranteed to be a CRIT hit.

skills.name: Domain of Night
skills.description: For each surviving ally (excluding minions) on the battlefield, Nyx gains 5% Dodge Rate and a 4% ATK boost.

upgrades.level2: For each surviving ally on the field (excluding summons), Nyx gains 10% Dodge Rate and a 5% ATK boost.
upgrades.level3: During the first 10s of the battle, this skill's bonus is doubled.
upgrades.level4: For each surviving ally on the field (excluding summons), Nyx gains 20% Dodge Rate and a 6% ATK boost. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Darkest Fear
relic.description: If a target marked by Evernight Raid is defeated, applies Terror to enemies near the target for 2s.

upgrades.level2: Enemies damaged by Evernight Raid cannot receive shields or healing. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: If a target marked by Evernight Raid is defeated, applies Terror to enemies near the target for 3s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: All DMG dealt by Nyx ignores 70% of the target's Armor. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Pan
heroes.description: Pan, god of forests, wildlife and shepherds, bears the head and torso of a human, with the legs, horns, and ears of a goat.

skills.name: Panic Whispers
skills.description: Pan attacks the enemy with the highest current Energy, dealing DMG equal to 50% of ATK 4 times and draining all their Energy.

upgrades.level2: When cast, deals 5% more DMG for every 100 Energy the target has.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per hit to 60% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: When cast, deals 10% more DMG for every 100 Energy the target has.

skills.name: Pandean Pipes
skills.description: Targets the farthest enemy and dazes them for 4s. Dazed enemies cannot move but are awakened when taking DMG exceeding 10% of their max HP in a single hit.

upgrades.level2: Increases the duration of Daze to 7s.
upgrades.level3: Enemies cannot regenerate Energy when dazed.
upgrades.level4: If a dazed enemy Deity is awakened by an attack, the attack deals 1.5× DMG.

skills.name: Rustic Murmur
skills.description: Whenever an enemy’s Energy exceeds 99%, Pan silences that enemy for 3s. This effect can only trigger once every 15s.

upgrades.level2: Increases the silence duration to 5s.
upgrades.level3: This effect can trigger once every 10s.
upgrades.level4: When the effect is triggered, Pan restores 100 Energy.

skills.name: Shepherd’s Dread
skills.description: Targets the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to them and surrounding enemies, and inflicts Terror for 4s. Terror reduces Move SPD by 90% and causes enemies to flee.

upgrades.level2: DMG increases to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Terror duration extends to 7s.
upgrades.level4: After Terror ends, the enemy’s ATK SPD is reduced by 40% for 4s.

relic.name: The Goat’s Bond
relic.description: Any debuff applied by Pan deals 60% of his ATK as DMG per second to its bearer.

upgrades.level2: Any debuff applied by Pan deals 80% of his ATK as DMG per second to the bearer.
upgrades.level3: For each debuff on the target, DMG dealt to that target is increased by 50%, stacking up to 4 times.
upgrades.level4: Any debuff applied by Pan deals 100% of his ATK as DMG per second to the bearer.

heroes.name: Phoenix
heroes.description: Phoenix, the immortal bird that rises from ashes, embodies hope and rebirth.

skills.name: Flaming Rebirth
skills.description: When Phoenix falls, she casts Rise From Ashes. If she is the only remaining unit and under Rise From Ashes, the battle is lost (can only trigger once per battle). (Rise From Ashes: Becomes untargetable, restores 15% of max HP per sec, revives when HP is fully restored.)

upgrades.level2: Keeps her Energy upon revival. (Unlocks at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Rise From Ashes can now trigger unlimited times. If she is the only remaining unit and under Rise From Ashes, the battle is lost. (Unlocks at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: When Phoenix casts Rise From Ashes for the first time, she gains 50% max HP. (Unlocks at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Ashes to Everflame
skills.description: Phoenix targets the farthest unit, sacrificing 50% of her max HP to summon a phoenix that strikes the target, dealing DMG equal to 240% of her ATK + 100% of sacrificed HP to the target and all units along the path.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK bonus to 270%.
upgrades.level3: Increases the conversion ratio of sacrificed HP to 120%.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK bonus to 300%.

skills.name: Blazing Feather
skills.description: Each Phoenix's Normal Attack consumes 10% of her current HP, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK and inflicting a stack of Soul Burn on the target. (Soul Burn: Deals DMG equal to 75% of ATK every 2s for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.)

upgrades.level2: Increases the ATK bonus of Soul Burn to 85%.
upgrades.level3: Units with Soul Burn explode when falling, dealing DMG equal to 50% Phoenix's ATK × Soul Burn stacks to nearby enemies.
upgrades.level4: Increases the ATK bonus of Soul Burn to 100%.

skills.name: Rise From Ashes
skills.description: Phoenix gains 5% ATK SPD for every 10% of max HP lost, stacking up to 10 times.

upgrades.level2: Gains 7.5% ATK SPD.
upgrades.level3: Gains an additional 50 Energy.
upgrades.level4: Gains 10% ATK SPD. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Scorching Remedy
relic.description: Phoenix restores HP equal to 200% of ATK + 25% of lost HP over 10s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 220% ATK.
upgrades.level3: The healing effect is increased to 30% when her HP drops below 50%.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 250% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

heroes.description: Aetis, known as Pisces, rules over emotion and awareness, granting all beings the power to feel the world deeply.

heroes.name: Poseidon
heroes.description: Poseidon, god of the sea and quakes, presides over tides, storms, and tremors. He can summon towering surges or calm the waters.

skills.name: Raging Tide
skills.description: Gains 200 Energy upon entering battle. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: Poseidon casts Rogue Wave upon entering battle, but it deals 50% reduced DMG. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)

skills.description: Poseidon raises his trident, summoning two tidal waves on both sides of the battlefield. Enemies within range are pushed 2 meters and take DMG equal to 200% of his ATK.

upgrades.level2: When the two tidal waves meet in the middle, they create a violent swell, knocking down enemies at the center and dealing additional DMG equal to 100% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 220%.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250%.

upgrades.level2: Gains a shield equal to 40% of max HP.

heroes.name: Scorpio
heroes.description: Melard, known as Scorpio, embodies cold-blooded creatures. One glimpse of her face awakens deep, frequent dread and reveals her devastating power.

heroes.name: Sekhmet
heroes.description: Sekhmet is the goddess of fire, war, vengeance, menstruation, and medicine.

skills.name: Taste My Claws!
skills.description: Performs 3 kicks and deals DMG to enemies in a cone. The first 2 hits deal DMG equal to 80% of ATK, and the last hit deals DMG equal to 120% of ATK and knocks back the target.

upgrades.level2: Increases the last hit's DMG to 150% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG of the first 2 hits to 90% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases the last hit's DMG to 180% of ATK.

skills.name: Dare Anger Me?!
skills.description: Sekhmet launches an enemy, strikes the target 6 times, each dealing DMG equal to 30% of ATK, and finishes with a heavy blow dealing DMG equal to 400% of ATK. She is immune to Crowd Control for the skill's duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases the last hit's DMG to 500% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Takes 50% reduced DMG during the skill.
upgrades.level4: The last hit deals extra DMG equal to 10% of the target's lost HP (up to 250% of her ATK).

skills.name: Roaring Fury
skills.description: Dealing DMG increases her ATK by 5%, stacking up to 20 times.

upgrades.level2: Every 5 stacks grant an extra 10% ATK SPD.
upgrades.level3: Each stack increases her ATK by 7.5%.
upgrades.level4: At maximum stacks, Normal Attacks also stun the target for 0.5s.

skills.name: You Challenge Me?
skills.description: Initiates a duel with the nearest enemy. Both participants will always prioritize attacking each other, and they take 50% less DMG from enemies not involved in the duel. The duel lasts 8s or until one participant falls.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to the duel target by 10% during the duel.
upgrades.level3: Increases her Lifesteal by 20% during the duel.
upgrades.level4: Duration extends to 10s.

relic.name: Bond of Life and Death
relic.description: When Roaring Fury is fully stacked, Normal Attacks deal extra DMG equal to 10% of the target's max HP (up to 200% of her ATK).

upgrades.level2: Enhances You Challenge Me?: The target cannot gain DMG RED.
upgrades.level3: You Challenge Me?: Increases the max HP and ATK by 6% during the duel for every nearby ally.
upgrades.level4: You Challenge Me?: Increases the max HP and ATK by 8% during the duel for every nearby ally.

heroes.name: Set
heroes.description: Set, god of storm and chaos, rules over gale, desert and destruction, yet is also seen as a guardian of light and order.

skills.name: Frenzied Sand Whirl
skills.description: Set swings his spear, dealing DMG to targets in front of him while dashing forward. He repeats this move three times. The first two strikes deal DMG equal to 100% of ATK and slightly knock back enemies. The third strike deals DMG equal to 320% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases the third attack's bonus to 350% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: The third attack is guaranteed to hit.
upgrades.level4: Increases the third attack's bonus to 380% of ATK.

skills.name: Sand Burial
skills.description: Set swings his weapon, dealing DMG equal to 240% of ATK to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Reduces hit targets’ Armor by 15% for 5s.
upgrades.level3: Increases the DMG bonus to 270% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Reduces hit targets’ Armor by 30% for 5s.

skills.name: Dunes’ Bloodrage
skills.description: Grants all allies on the battlefield 15% Lifesteal.

upgrades.level2: Increases all allies’ ATK by 15%.
upgrades.level3: Increases Lifesteal to 25%.
upgrades.level4: Allies around Set gain an additional 15% Lifesteal.

skills.name: Khamsin’s Shelter
skills.description: Set leaps behind the most vulnerable ally, granting himself and that ally a shield equal to 240% of ATK for 8s.

upgrades.level2: Increases the shield bonus to 270% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Set and that ally gain 30% ATK SPD for 8s.
upgrades.level4: Increases the shield bonus to 300% of ATK.

relic.name: Dance of the Sands
relic.description: Each Sand Burial cast increases the DMG of the next Sand Burial by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

upgrades.level2: The effect of Dunes’ Bloodrage remains active after Set falls.
upgrades.level3: Each Normal Attack has a 30% chance to trigger Sand Burial. When HP drops to 50%/20%, the trigger chance is increased to 50%/100%.
upgrades.level4: Each Sand Burial cast increases the DMG of the next Sand Burial by 20%, stacking up to 5 times.

heroes.name: Surtr
heroes.description: Surtr, godess of desctruction and renewal, is the greatest Fiery Jotunn and the executor of Ragnarok.

skills.name: Burn to Ashes
skills.description: Channels fire to forge a giant flaming greatsword, locks the farthest enemy, and slashes in their direction, dealing DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies in a rectangle. If the target's current HP is above 70%, the DMG is increased by 25%.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 330%.
upgrades.level3: Deals 35% increased DMG to enemies with HP above 50%.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 360%.

skills.name: Fiery Scourge
skills.description: Roots the nearest enemy in a flaming cage for 3s, allowing attacks but dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per sec to them.

upgrades.level2: Deals 110% ATK as DMG per sec.
upgrades.level3: Rooted enemies take 15% increased M-DMG.
upgrades.level4: Deals 120% ATK as DMG per sec. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Unquenchable Flame
skills.description: Surtr gains a shield equal to 240% ATK for every 3 skills cast.

upgrades.level2: Surtr gains a shield equal to 270% ATK for every 3 skills cast.
upgrades.level3: Surtr's ATK is increased by 20% when he is shielded.
upgrades.level4: Surtr gains a shield equal to 300% ATK for every 3 skills cast. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Skyward Inferno
skills.description: Summons a blazing sword to orbit her and then locks the nearest target to deal DMG equal to 300% of her ATK.

upgrades.level2: Deals 320% ATK as DMG.
upgrades.level3: Reduces healing received by hit enemies by 50% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Deals 350% ATK as DMG.

relic.name: Soul Scorch
relic.description: After Surtr casts his Ultimate, Skyward Inferno will also attack the 2 nearest enemies until the battle ends. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: Surtr's Ultimate grants Skyward Inferno CD exemption for 6s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Increases the casting speed of Skyward Inferno by 50%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Surtr's Ultimate grants Skyward Inferno CD exemption for 10s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Tefnur
heroes.description: Tefnut, the living Heaven's Teardrop, rules over moisture, rain and purification, summoning life giving and cleansing drops.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Creates a rain curtain within a 3-meter area around the ally being attacked by the most enemies. Allies within the area restore HP equal to 150% of ATK per second for 6s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 175% of ATK per second.
upgrades.level3: Enemies inside the area have their ATK reduced by 30%.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 200% of ATK per second.

skills.name: Spirit Therapy
skills.description: Restores HP equal to 200% of ATK to the frontmost ally, then restores HP equal to 50% of ATK each time they are attacked for the next 5s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Restores HP equal to 75% of ATK when attacked.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: When an ally's HP drops below 30%, instantly grants them a shield equal to 250% of ATK (Passive). This effect can only trigger once every 12s.

upgrades.level2: When the shield expires, deals DMG equal to 150% of ATK to enemies within 3 meters.
upgrades.level3: Shield strength increases to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: When the shield expires, deals DMG equal to 180% of ATK to enemies within 3 meters.

skills.name: Rainrush
skills.description: Tefnut releases splashes, dealing DMG equal to 180% of ATK and knocking back enemies.

upgrades.level2: Tefnut gains 50 Energy for each enemy hit by the splashes (can trigger up to 5 times per cast).
upgrades.level3: Hit enemies have their M-RES reduced by 20% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.

relic.name: The Second Rain
relic.description: Casting Soothing Rain triggers an additional Spirit Therapy.

upgrades.level2: Allies within Soothing Rain's range take 50% less DMG.
upgrades.level3: Upon taking lethal DMG, Tefnut becomes immune to that DMG and gains a Life Barrier shield. This effect can only trigger once per battle.
upgrades.level4: Dispels one debuff from allies within range every 2s during Soothing Rain.
