heroes.name: Yanluo
heroes.description: Yanluo, judge of the underworld, governs the birth and death of all. In his left hand rests the Book of Life and Death; in his right the Judge's Brush.

skills.name: Underworld Arbitration
skills.description: Exposes an enemy’s past deeds and punishes them for their sins, dealing DMG equal to 200% of Yanluo’s ATK plus 200% of the target’s ATK and stunning them for 2s.

upgrades.level2: Deals DMG equal to 230% of Yanluo’s ATK and 230% of the target’s ATK.
upgrades.level3: Gains 400 Energy upon defeating a target.
upgrades.level4: Deals DMG equal to 260% of Yanluo’s ATK and 260% of the target’s ATK.

skills.name: Soul Reaver
skills.description: When no enemies are within his attack range, Yanluo throws chains to pull a distant enemy to him, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK, prioritizing the symmetrically opposite enemy.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 120% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Pulled enemies take 10% increased DMG for the next 10s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 140% of ATK.

skills.name: Yanluo’s Seal
skills.description: Restrains enemies with hellish chains for 6s, dealing DMG equal to 60% of ATK to them every second.

upgrades.level2: Yanluo restores HP equal to 50% of ATK per second.
upgrades.level3: DMG dealt per second increases to 65% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Yanluo takes 30% reduced DMG for the duration.

skills.name: Wheel of Karma
skills.description: Enemies that deal DMG to Yanluo lose 50 Energy. This can only trigger 4 times per enemy every 10s.

upgrades.level2: This effect triggers up to 5 times every 10s.
upgrades.level3: Increases the Energy drained to 60.
upgrades.level4: Increases the Energy drained to 70.

relic.name: Underworld Judgment
relic.description: Casting Soul Reaver marks the target. Marked enemies restore 150 Energy to other allies when defeated.

upgrades.level2: When an ally kills a marked enemy, the killer’s ATK is increased by 20%.
upgrades.level3: Marked enemies have their healing received reduced by 50% and Energy Regeneration reduced by 50%.
upgrades.level4: Marked enemies restore 200 Energy to other allies when defeated.

heroes.name: Yuelao
heroes.description: Yuelao, god of romance and marriage, uses his red threads to unite destined couples.

skills.name: Fated Affection
skills.description: Yuelao heals several allies in sequence, each heal restoring HP equal to 140% of ATK, repeating 6 times. If a linked unit is healed, the other linked unit also receives the healing.

upgrades.level2: Each heal restores HP equal to 160% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Allies healed gain 20% increased CRIT Rate for 5s. This effect cannot stack on the same target.
upgrades.level4: It now heals 8 times.

skills.name: Red Thread of Fate
skills.description: Yuelao links the ally with the highest ATK and the ally with the highest HP with a red thread, making them share 10% of their ATK, HP, Armor, and M-RES. This skill refunds its CD if no valid targets exist.

upgrades.level2: Increases the shared attributes to 12.5%.
upgrades.level3: If one linked ally falls, they transfer 50% of their remaining Energy to the other.
upgrades.level4: Increases the shared attributes to 15%.

skills.name: Bond of Fated Pair
skills.description: Yuelao increases the ATK of the ally with the highest ATK by 15% for 8s and restores 150 Energy to them. If that ally is linked, Yuelao will also increase the ATK of the other linked ally and restore their Energy.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK bonus to 20%.
upgrades.level3: Energy Regen increases to 180.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK bonus to 25%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Lanterns of Destiny
skills.description: Yuelao restores HP equal to 200% of ATK to the most vulnerable ally. If that ally is linked, Yuelao will also restore HP to the other linked ally.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 220% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases the allies' CRIT RES by 30% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 250% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Fate Bound
relic.description: The linked unit with the highest max HP will take 20% of the DMG dealt to the linked unit with the highest ATK. The linked unit with the highest ATK restores HP equal to 20% of the DMG dealt to the unit with the highest HP when dealing DMG.

upgrades.level2: When both linked units attack the same target, they deal an additional 15% DMG.
upgrades.level3: The ally with the highest HP takes 30% of the DMG dealt to the ally with the highest ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: The ally with the highest ATK restores HP equal to 30% of the DMG they deal to the ally with the highest HP. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

heroes.name: Zeus
heroes.description: Zeus, king of gods and mortals, rules over the sky, thunder, and justice. High among the clouds with Lightning Bolt in hand, he casts his gaze across the world, and all beings bow beneath his might.

skills.name: Almighty Thunderstrike
skills.description: Zeus summons his Echoes and rains down thunderbolts, striking all units 3 times, each dealing DMG equal to 120% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 160%.
upgrades.level3: Gains 500 Energy on entry.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 200%.

skills.name: Supreme Judgment
skills.description: Zeus judges the current target, dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK plus 8% of the target’s current HP (up to 100% of Zeus’s current ATK).

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: This skill ignores Dodge Rate.
upgrades.level4: Deals DMG equal to 12% of the target’s current HP (up to 150% of Zeus’s current ATK).

skills.name: Almighty Advent
skills.description: Summons an Echo that inherits 35% of Zeus’s max HP and 75% of his ATK, lasting 15s. If a single hit deals DMG exceeding 20% of his max HP, Zeus creates an Echo and blinks to the safest ally (Passive). This effect has a 20s cooldown.

upgrades.level2: Echoes inherit 50% of Zeus’s max HP.
upgrades.level3: Echoes inherit the Overload Unleash effect.
upgrades.level4: Echoes inherit 100% of Zeus’s ATK.

skills.name: Overload Unleash
skills.description: Increases ATK SPD by 8% and Ultimate DMG by 2% when gaining a buff from an ally. This effect can stack up to 10 times. At max stacks, Zeus gains Thundercrack, dealing 30% increased DMG.

upgrades.level2: Increases ATK SPD by 12% and Ultimate DMG by 3%.
upgrades.level3: Triggers Thundercrack upon reaching 8 stacks.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt by 50%.

relic.name: Divine Pulse
relic.description: When Zeus casts Almighty Thunderstrike, all Echoes on the field also cast it, dealing 70% of the original DMG.

upgrades.level2: After each Normal Attack, the next attack triggers Supreme Judgment. Increases Supreme Judgment DMG by 20%.
upgrades.level3: When Zeus casts Almighty Thunderstrike, all Echoes also cast it, dealing 100% of the original DMG.
upgrades.level4: Echoes can also trigger Divine Pulse and Supreme Judgment.
